s UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; UAE Leasing <uaeleasing@chalhoub.com>; Rent <Rent@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: STORE Renovation - YSL Dubai Mall on Sunday on 15th Jun 2025
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure for Renovation of  ‚ÄúYSL Dubai Mall last trading date on Sun 15th Jun 2025 and handover on 17th Jun.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.
*	Create a Return to warehouse by @Ahmed Essa <mailto:Ahmed.Essa@chalhoub.com>  and create an appointment/ ASN request trough one reach for all merchandising.
*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit (return stocks, transfer / stock packing/ IT Equipment) @YVES SAINT LAURENT <mailto:ysl.thedubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Roula Saman <mailto:Roula.Saman@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 15th Jun  . @YVES SAINT LAURENT <mailto:ysl.thedubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Roula Saman <mailto:Roula.Saman@chalhoub.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be transferred through Focus request non stock to Ghouse khan @YVES SAINT LAURENT <mailto:ysl.thedubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Roula Saman <mailto:Roula.Saman@chalhoub.com> 
*	Store phone devices/I pads if available to be transferred to Advice where it will be transferred  @Florian Cottone <mailto:Florian.Cottone@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR is dismantled on 17th Jun before trading hours

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach out at 050-3859997.

Regards,

Subject: RE: STORE Renovation - YSL Dubai Mall on Sunday on 15th Jun 2025
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Abdalla, Ahmed,

 

I hope you're both doing well.

 

Just to keep you informed, we have a minor update regarding the equipment removal. Please provide us a quotation excluding the UV printer and the engraving machine, as these will be removed by another supplier.

 

Thank you in advance .

 

 

Roula saman

 

Dubai mall boutique manager

Contact :+971563656554

SAJ EMIRATES TRADING LLC 

DUBAI-UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; UAE Leasing <uaeleasing@chalhoub.com>; Rent <Rent@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: STORE Renovation - YSL Dubai Mall on Sunday on 15th Jun 2025

 

Dear Team,

I hope this message finds you well.

Firstly, I would like to extend my sincere thanks to each of you for your outstanding cooperation and patience during the cluster closure. Your efforts ensured a smooth and organized transition.

Please find below a summarized list of the key tasks completed, categorized by responsibility:

________________________________

üì¶ Equipment & Asset Collection

*	POS & IT Equipment:

	*	POS system, office PC, printer, and footfall counting CCTV collected ‚Äì @Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com> 
	*	POS laptop collected ‚Äì @Roula Saman <mailto:Roula.Saman@chalhoub.com> 
	*	All CCTV cameras and NVR dismantled on 18th June ‚Äì @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> 

*	Credit Card Machines & Invoices:

	*	Credit card machines and manual invoice books are with me @Roula Saman <mailto:Roula.Saman@chalhoub.com> 
	*	Two old credit card machines and three new manual invoice books transferred to D3 office ‚Äì @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com> 

*	Digital Screens & Machines:

	*	Six digital screens, engraving machine, UV printer, and an iPad removed By Abra ‚Äì @Florian Cottone <mailto:Florian.Cottone@chalhoub.com> 

*	Other Assets:

	*	iPads and two helmets collected ‚Äì @Florian Cottone <mailto:Florian.Cottone@chalhoub.com> 
	*	Safe, ladder, refrigerator, staff locker, and office chair collected by the warehouse team ‚Äì @Kawttar Nassik <mailto:Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com> 
	*	Four cartons of non-stock items retained for DM reopening ‚Äì @Feras Alnaiemi <mailto:Feras.Alnaiemi@chalhoub.com>

Thank you once again for your dedication and teamwork. If you have any questions or need further clarification on any of the above points, please do not hesitate to reach out.

 

@Kawttar Nassik <mailto:Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com>  Your support is highly appreciated.

Thanks 

Roula saman

 

Dubai mall boutique manager

asing@chalhoub.com <mailto:uaeleasing@chalhoub.com> >; Rent <Rent@chalhoub.com <mailto:Rent@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: STORE Renovation - YSL Dubai Mall on Sunday on 15th Jun 2025
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure for Renovation of  ‚ÄúYSL Dubai Mall last trading date on Sun 15th Jun 2025 and handover on 17th Jun.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.
*	Create a Return to warehouse by @Ahmed Essa <mailto:Ahmed.Essa@chalhoub.com>  and create an appointment/ ASN request trough one reach for all merchandising.
*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit (return stocks, transfer / stock packing/ IT Equipment) @YVES SAINT LAURENT <mailto:ysl.thedubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Roula Saman <mailto:Roula.Saman@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 15th Jun  . @YVES SAINT LAURENT <mailto:ysl.thedubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Roula Saman <mailto:Roula.Saman@chalhoub.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be transferred through Focus request non stock to Ghouse khan @YVES SAINT LAURENT <mailto:ysl.thedubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Roula Saman <mailto:Roula.Saman@chalhoub.com> 
*	Store phone devices/I pads if available to be transferred to Advice where it will be transferred  @Florian Cottone <mailto:Florian.Cottone@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR is dismantled on 17th Jun before trading hours
